channel.description: IBM MQ channel name for connection
channel.title: Channel

collect_channel_config.description: Enable collection of channel configuration metrics
collect_channel_config.title: Collect Channel Config

collect_queue_config.description: Enable collection of queue configuration metrics
collect_queue_config.title: Collect Queue Config

collect_reset_queue_stats.description: Enable collection of queue statistics (destructive operation)
collect_reset_queue_stats.title: Collect Reset Queue Stats

collect_statistics_queue.description: Enable collection of statistics queue metrics (SYSTEM.ADMIN.STATISTICS.QUEUE provides advanced metrics like min/max depth)
collect_statistics_queue.title: Collect Statistics Queue

collect_sys_topics.description: Enable collection of $SYS topic metrics (provides Queue Manager CPU, memory, and log utilization)
collect_sys_topics.title: Collect Sys Topics

collect_system_channels.description: Enable collection of system channel metrics (SYSTEM.* channels show clustering and administrative health)
collect_system_channels.title: Collect System Channels

collect_system_listeners.description: Enable collection of system listener metrics (SYSTEM.* listeners show internal connectivity)
collect_system_listeners.title: Collect System Listeners

collect_system_queues.description: Enable collection of system queue metrics (SYSTEM.* queues provide critical infrastructure visibility)
collect_system_queues.title: Collect System Queues

collect_system_topics.description: Enable collection of system topic metrics (SYSTEM.* topics show internal messaging patterns)
collect_system_topics.title: Collect System Topics

exclude_queues.description: Patterns to exclude queues after inclusion (wildcards supported).
exclude_queues.title: Exclude Queues

host.description: IBM MQ server hostname or IP address
host.title: Host

include_queues.description: Patterns to include queues (wildcards supported). Empty means include everything.
include_queues.title: Include Queues

max_channels.description: Maximum number of channels to collect (0 = no limit)
max_channels.title: Max Channels

max_listeners.description: Maximum number of listeners to collect (0 = no limit)
max_listeners.title: Max Listeners

max_queues.description: Maximum number of queues to collect (0 = no limit)
max_queues.title: Max Queues

max_topics.description: Maximum number of topics to collect (0 = no limit)
max_topics.title: Max Topics

queue_manager.description: IBM MQ Queue Manager name to connect to
queue_manager.title: Queue Manager

statistics_interval,omitempty.description: Statistics collection interval in seconds (auto-detected STATINT overwrites this value)
statistics_interval,omitempty.title: Statistics Interval,omitempty

sys_topic_interval,omitempty.description: $SYS topic collection interval in seconds (user override for customized MQ configurations)
sys_topic_interval,omitempty.title: Sys Topic Interval,omitempty
